game.title: Echoes of Eternity
game.synopsis: In a world where memories can be transferred from one person to another, humanity has achieved a state of collective immortality. However, with this newfound power comes the threat of a dark force known only as "The Devourer," which seeks to erase entire civilizations from existence. Players take on the role of an Archivist, tasked with exploring ancient ruins and uncovering memories that hold the key to defeating The Devourer.
game.beginning: The game begins in the city of New Eden, where the player's character is inducted into the prestigious Order of Archivists. Their first mission takes them to the ancient city of Erebo, where they discover a cryptic message that sets them on a quest to uncover the secrets of the past.
game.ending: As the player delves deeper into the world's mysteries, they ultimately discover that The Devourer is not just a mindless force, but a symptom of humanity's own darker impulses. In the final confrontation, the player must make a choice: to preserve the status quo and risk eternal stagnation, or to sacrifice the collective memories of humanity in order to forge a new path forward.
